SEARCH
Package org.hms.services.storage

Class StorageService

java.lang.Object
org.hms.services.AbstractService<IDataInterface>
org.hms.services.storage.StorageService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAppointmentDataInterface, IDrugStockDataInterface, IMedicalDataInterface, IDataInterface
public class StorageService extends AbstractService<IDataInterface> implements IMedicalDataInterface, IAppointmentDataInterface, IDrugStockDataInterface
The StorageService class manages the storage and retrieval of various healthcare data tables. It extends AbstractService and implements IMedicalDataInterface, IAppointmentDataInterface, and IDrugStockDataInterface to provide a comprehensive storage solution for medical records, appointments, drug inventory, and other related data.

  • Field Details

    • dataRoot

      private static final String dataRoot
      The root directory for storing data files. This directory is constructed based on the user's current working directory.

    • drugDispenseRequestCounter

      private static int drugDispenseRequestCounter
      Counter to track the number of drug dispense requests made. This field is used to generate unique identifiers for each drug dispense request. Note: This implementation is a temporary solution and should be refactored.

    • drugInventoryTable

      private DrugInventoryTable drugInventoryTable
      Represents the table that manages the drug inventory. This field holds an instance of the DrugInventoryTable providing methods to manipulate and access drug inventory data.

    • drugReplenishRequestTable

      private DrugReplenishRequestTable drugReplenishRequestTable
      A private field in the StorageService that manages drug replenish requests. It utilizes the DrugReplenishRequestTable class to store and handle operations related to drug replenishments.

    • medicalRecordTable

      private MedicalRecord medicalRecordTable
      Represents a table of medical records within the storage service. This variable stores an instance of the MedicalRecord class, which contains a collection of medical entries.

    • patientParticularsTable

      private PatientTable patientParticularsTable
      Represents the table containing patient particulars. This table is responsible for managing and maintaining entries related to patient data, including patient ID, name, birthdate, gender, and blood type.

    • contactInformationTable

      private ContactInformationTable contactInformationTable
      Holds the table of contact information, which includes entries such as phone numbers, emails, and addresses associated with patients. This table provides the functionality to manage, format, and render contact information entries.

    • staffTable

      private StaffTable staffTable
      Represents the table containing all staff-related information. This table is used to store and manage data pertaining to staff members, including their details, roles, and other pertinent information required for hospital management and scheduling.

  • Constructor Details

    • StorageService

      public StorageService()
      Constructs a StorageService instance and initializes various data tables necessary for the application.

      The constructor is responsible for initializing the following tables: - Drug Inventory Table - Drug Replenish Request Table - Medical Record Table - Patient Particulars Table - Contact Information Table - Staff Table

      Each table is initialized by invoking its respective initialization method that loads data from a CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • initializeStaffTable

      private void initializeStaffTable()
      Initializes the staff table by loading data from the staff CSV file. The CSV file is located at the path specified by the dataRoot field. If an IOException occurs during the loading process, it is wrapped in a RuntimeException and thrown.

    • initializeContactInformationTable

      private void initializeContactInformationTable()
      Initializes the contact information table by loading data from a CSV file. It constructs a new ContactInformationTable instance using a file path provided by the `dataRoot` field and attempts to load the contact data.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs while loading the file

    • initializePatientParticularsTable

      private void initializePatientParticularsTable()
      Initializes the patient particulars table by loading patient data from a CSV file.

      This method sets up the `patientParticularsTable` field by creating a new instance of `PatientTable` using the path to the `PatientList.csv` file. It then attempts to load the data from the specified file. If an I/O error occurs during this process, a `RuntimeException` is thrown.

      The `PatientTable` class is designed to handle the storage and management of patient particulars. It reads from the CSV file and populates the table accordingly.

      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an issue with loading the patient data from the file.

    • initializeDrugReplenishRequestTable

      private void initializeDrugReplenishRequestTable()
      Initializes the DrugReplenishRequestTable by setting its file path to the specified CSV file and loading its contents from the file. If an I/O error occurs while loading the data, a RuntimeException is thrown.

    • initializeDrugInventoryTable

      private void initializeDrugInventoryTable()
      Initializes the drug inventory table by linking it to a CSV file and loading its contents. This method sets up the `drugInventoryTable` using the path provided by the `dataRoot`, and calls `loadFromFile` to populate it with data from the specified file. If an IOException occurs during the file loading process, a RuntimeException is thrown.

    • initializeMedicalRecordTable

      private void initializeMedicalRecordTable()
      Initializes the medical records table for the application. This method sets up the medicalRecordTable by loading data from the specified CSV file. If an I/O error occurs while loading the file, it throws a RuntimeException.

    • getContactInformationTable

      public ContactInformationTable getContactInformationTable()
      Retrieves the ContactInformationTable, which contains and manages contact information entries such as phone numbers, emails, and addresses associated with patients.
      Specified by:

    • createNewDrugDispenseRequest

      public DrugDispenseRequest createNewDrugDispenseRequest(String drugName, int addQuantity)
      Creates a new DrugDispenseRequest with the specified drug name and quantity, and assigns it a unique ID.
      Specified by:
      createNewDrugDispenseRequest in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
      drugName - The name of the drug to be dispensed.
      addQuantity - The quantity of the drug to be added to the dispense request.
      Returns:
      A newly created DrugDispenseRequest object with the given drug name and quantity, set to pending status.

    • readAppointments

      public List<AppointmentInformation> readAppointments()
      Reads appointment data from a CSV file and returns a list of appointment information. The method parses the CSV file line by line, extracting details for each appointment and creating corresponding AppointmentInformation objects.
      Specified by:
      readAppointments in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Returns:
      List of AppointmentInformation objects representing the appointments read from the CSV file.

    • writeAppointmentsToCsv

      public void writeAppointmentsToCsv(List<AppointmentInformation> appointments)
      Writes a list of appointments to a CSV file at the designated location.
      Specified by:
      writeAppointmentsToCsv in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
      appointments - List of AppointmentInformation objects representing the appointments to be written to the CSV file.

    • loadSchedule

      public AppointmentSchedule loadSchedule(String date)
      Loads the appointment schedule for a specific date from a CSV file.
      Specified by:
      loadSchedule in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which the schedule should be loaded, in the format "YYYY-MM-DD".
      Returns:
      An AppointmentSchedule object containing the loaded schedule data.

    • writeScheduleToCSV

      public void writeScheduleToCSV(AppointmentSchedule schedule, String date)
      Writes the scheduling matrix of an AppointmentSchedule object to a CSV file.
      Specified by:
      writeScheduleToCSV in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
      schedule - The AppointmentSchedule object containing the scheduling matrix to be written.
      date - The date used to name the CSV file, indicating the schedule's date.

    • writeAppointmentOutcomeToCSV

      public void writeAppointmentOutcomeToCSV(AppointmentOutcome outcome)
      Writes the outcome of an appointment to a CSV file. The method captures details such as appointment ID, patient ID, type of appointment, consultation notes, and prescribed medications.
      Specified by:
      writeAppointmentOutcomeToCSV in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
      outcome - The outcome of the appointment, encapsulating appointment ID, patient ID, type of appointment, consultation notes, and prescribed medications.

    • readAppointmentOutcomesFromCSV

      public ArrayList<AppointmentOutcome> readAppointmentOutcomesFromCSV()
      Reads appointment outcomes from a CSV file and returns a list of AppointmentOutcome objects. Each line in the CSV represents an appointment outcome with various fields such as appointment ID, patient ID, type of appointment, consultation notes, and prescribed medications.

      The method handles potential IOExceptions and formats errors gracefully.

      Specified by:
      readAppointmentOutcomesFromCSV in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of AppointmentOutcome objects parsed from the CSV file.

    • writeAllAppointmentOutcomesToCSV

      public void writeAllAppointmentOutcomesToCSV(ArrayList<AppointmentOutcome> appointmentOutcomes)
      Writes a list of AppointmentOutcome objects to a CSV file.
      Specified by:
      writeAllAppointmentOutcomesToCSV in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
      appointmentOutcomes - an ArrayList of AppointmentOutcome objects representing the outcomes of various appointments.

    • getAllDateFile

      public File[] getAllDateFile()
      Retrieves all CSV files containing appointment scheduling data from the specified directory. The method fetches files from the directory path constructed using the root data directory and the "Appointment/schedules/" subpath.
      Specified by:
      getAllDateFile in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Returns:
      An array of File objects representing all CSV files in the specified directory. If no CSV files are found or the directory is invalid, the method returns null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the directory does not exist or is not a valid directory.

    • getStaffForSchedule

      public Staff getStaffForSchedule(String staffId)
      Retrieves the Staff object associated with the given staff ID.
      Specified by:
      getStaffForSchedule in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
      staffId - The ID of the staff member whose information is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      The Staff object corresponding to the given staff ID, or null if no such staff member exists.

    • getStaffNameByID

      public String getStaffNameByID(String userId)
      Retrieves the name of the staff member corresponding to the given user ID.
      Specified by:
      getStaffNameByID in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the staff member whose name is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the name of the staff member with the provided ID, or null if no such staff member is found

    • checkScheduleExist

      public boolean checkScheduleExist(String date)
      Checks if a schedule file exists for the given date.
      Specified by:
      checkScheduleExist in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
      date - The date in "yyyyMMdd" format for which the schedule existence needs to be verified.
      Returns:
      true if a schedule file exists for the given date, false otherwise.

    • initializeSchedule

      public void initializeSchedule(String date)
      Initializes the appointment schedule for the specified date by copying a template schedule file.
      Specified by:
      initializeSchedule in interface IAppointmentDataInterface
      Parameters:
